item.description: Join us at Gail Fuller's home in Bristol New Year's Eve from 8 pm until we ring in the new year!  Join the festivity and party with us.  Let’s celebrate together, have a great time, and maybe even dance!  Dress to impress, BYOB, and dish to share (casserole, salad, dessert).  Dues paying Members $5, Guests $10.  If you don’t want to bring food, extra $5.  To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 35 Anthony Drive:  I‑84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington St., at 2nd light left onto Northwest Drive, at end right onto Camp Street, left onto O'Sullivan Drive, at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Avenue, left onto Anthony Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles New Year's Potluck Party
